page.title: 01General Description
page.content: Our area is predominantly rural, the village of Egerton and hamlet of Lenham Heath are surrounded by agricultural land comprising of cereal and fruit growing and grazing for sheep and cattle. There is a small area of deciduous woodland and in Egerton an amenity area. Houses in the village are clustered around the church, shop, primary school and inn and lead out of the village on the main roads. The area contains many old and restored properties interspersed with post_war housing. The village is populated largely by families in which at least one member commutes to work; other commuters are our secondary school children. Public transport has gradually declined, now most families own at least one vehicle.
